page.html:
Weekly Alerts!

The full subscription comes with the following weekly updates delivered to you via Facebook Messenger:

1. Weekly Cow Sales Alert



☝️ Every week you get a selection of the latest cows for sale, including prices and location!

and also…

2. Weekly Milk Price Alert



☝️ Every week you get a report on 100s of milk prices around Kenya, split by different categories: broker, co-op, processor and milk bar!

Expertise, Top Questions & Real Farmer Experiences!

With the full subscription you can unlock all the topics in this guide. Each topic includes:



☝️ Our guides include research from respected expert sources, you can quickly see this information highlighted light green.


☝️ We know that real farmer questions are important so we select top questions from members in blue.


☝️ We then select real farmer answers and farmer experiences that are relevant, you can find these in darker green

How do I sign up?

It’s simple take a look at the full package page to find out how to get unrestricted access!

If you want to see all topics in the guide again go here…
